mapper.select: SELECT INCM_CD, INCM_CLS, HABT_CLS, INCM_NM, STAN_INCM_CD, STAN_INCM_SEQ FROM ACT_INCM_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND INCM_NM LIKE '%' || #{incmNm} || '%' ORDER BY INCM_CD
SELECT A.NTN_CD, B.NTN_NM, A.INCM_RATE, A.INHABT_RATE FROM ACT_NTN_RATE A INNER JOIN COM_NTN_MGT B ON A.NTN_CD = B.NTN_CD WHERE A.INCM_CD = #{incmCd}
